public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity fetchFlight(@PathVariable(value="flightNumber")

                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="xml",required=false)
                                                                                               java.lang.String xml)
        Fetch Flight details by Flight Number
        Parameters:
        flightNumber - FlightId of the flight
        xml - Will return output as XML, if true
        Returns:
        Flight information of given flightNumber
